headline.main: US Eyes Rapprochement With Sudan in Nod to Allies
headline.print_headline: US Eyes Rapprochement With Sudan in Nod to Allies

docs.snippet: The Obama administration, which has negotiated new relationships with states like Cuba, Iran and Myanmar, is now eyeing a rapprochement with Sudan, a nation that has long been designated a state sponsor of terrorism and whose current leader has be...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration, which has negotiated new relationships with states like Cuba, Iran and Myanmar, is now eyeing a rapprochement with Sudan, a nation that has long been designated a state sponsor of terrorism and whose current leader has been indicted on war crimes charges.

headline.main: The Latest Example of Donald Trump’s Double-Talk

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump touted his support for Egypt in a meeting with the country’s president. But one of Mr. Trump’s advisers paints a different picture....
docs.abstract: Mr. Trump touted his support for Egypt in a meeting with the country’s president. But one of Mr. Trump’s advisers paints a different picture.

headline.main: Fewer Mexicans Drive Changes in US Immigrant Population
headline.print_headline: Fewer Mexicans Drive Changes in US Immigrant Population

docs.snippet: The number of immigrants in the U.S. illegally has held steady since the Great Recession ended, totaling 11.1 million in 2014, 11.2 million in 2012 and 11.3 million in 2009, according to a study released Tuesday by Pew Research Center (http://pewr...
docs.lead_paragraph: The number of immigrants in the U.S. illegally has held steady since the Great Recession ended, totaling 11.1 million in 2014, 11.2 million in 2012 and 11.3 million in 2009, according to a study released Tuesday by Pew Research Center (http://pewrsr.ch/2dh78XI ).

headline.main: As Peace Nears, Colombia's FARC Rebels Reunite With Lost Families
headline.print_headline: As Peace Nears, Colombia's FARC Rebels Reunite With Lost Families

docs.snippet: Tatiana, her pregnant belly bulging beneath a T-shirt decorated with the FARC rebel group's logo, leans down to stroke her teenage son's hair, as if to reassure herself he is really beside her....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tatiana, her pregnant belly bulging beneath a T-shirt decorated with the FARC rebel group's logo, leans down to stroke her teenage son's hair, as if to reassure herself he is really beside her.

headline.main: Court Weighs Fairness of Life Sentence for Teenage Killer
headline.print_headline: Court Weighs Fairness of Life Sentence for Teenage Killer

docs.snippet: An attorney for a Virginia man handed life in prison without parole for his murder conviction as a teenager told a federal appeals court Tuesday that the sentence was unconstitutional in light of a U.S. Supreme Court decision that opened the door ...
docs.lead_paragraph: An attorney for a Virginia man handed life in prison without parole for his murder conviction as a teenager told a federal appeals court Tuesday that the sentence was unconstitutional in light of a U.S. Supreme Court decision that opened the door for inmates nationwide who were convicted as juveniles to seek their freedom.

headline.main: McAfee's MGT Sinks 21 Percent After NYSE Refuses Share Listing
headline.print_headline: McAfee's MGT Sinks 21 Percent After NYSE Refuses Share Listing

docs.snippet: Shares of MGT Capital Investments, led by anti-virus software pioneer John McAfee, dropped 21 percent on Tuesday after it said the New York Stock Exchange denied approval of the listing of shares for a planned merger with anti-spyware company D-Va...
docs.lead_paragraph: Shares of MGT Capital Investments, led by anti-virus software pioneer John McAfee, dropped 21 percent on Tuesday after it said the New York Stock Exchange denied approval of the listing of shares for a planned merger with anti-spyware company D-Vasive Inc.

headline.main: PGA Tour Boss Rues Lack of Expansion Outside U.S
headline.print_headline: PGA Tour Boss Rues Lack of Expansion Outside U.S

docs.snippet: Tim Finchem says he regrets that the PGA Tour has not expanded more globally during his long tenure as commissioner, while at the same time he is confident that golf has cemented its place in the Olympic Games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tim Finchem says he regrets that the PGA Tour has not expanded more globally during his long tenure as commissioner, while at the same time he is confident that golf has cemented its place in the Olympic Games.

headline.main: VW's Audi Head Questioned Over Emissions Scandal
headline.print_headline: VW's Audi Head Questioned Over Emissions Scandal

docs.snippet: The head of Volkswagen's luxury car division Audi has been questioned by investigators looking into the company's emissions scandal, VW Chief Executive Matthias Mueller said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The head of Volkswagen's luxury car division Audi has been questioned by investigators looking into the company's emissions scandal, VW Chief Executive Matthias Mueller said on Tuesday.
